description: Astilbe 'Erica' is an amazing plant species that is perfect for low areas in any garden. It thrives in moist, well-draining soil, and is tolerant of a wide range of pH levels. Its stunning purple-pink flower spikes make it a beautiful addition to any garden. It also has lush, vibrant foliage that stays evergreen, even in cold and shady spots. Its long bloom season from May to August brightens any garden landscape, and its plume-like blooms attract hummingbirds, butterflies and other pollinators by the dozens. It's a reliable and hardy plant that is sure to bring any garden to life.
